version_description:
• Fixed minor bug associated with sticky "pull to refresh" animation on iOS app

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate the us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Fixed minor Discover feed red dot issue
• General improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate the us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Improved Today tab 'Pull to Refresh' performance

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate the us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Added ability to 'Pull to Refresh' on the Today tab 'Working on Today's Sleep Report' view

Find out why SleepWatch is a better way to track your sleep. Join the countless Watch owners now working towards a better night's sleep with SleepWatch!

• Fixed minor bug associated with delayed updating of Today tab 'Data as of' label on iOS app

Find out why SleepWatch is a better way to track your sleep. Join the countless Watch owners now working towards a better night's sleep with SleepWatch!
• Fixed missing content in Healthy Tips section of Sleeping Heart Rate Dip detail view within Today tab

• General improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Learn more about your Restful Sleep result by tapping on the Total Restful Sleep Time widget from the iOS Today tab
• Premium members can now see how their Restful Sleep compares to other users
• General performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• General performance improvements

• General performance improvements

• iOS 12 and Watch OS 5 ready!
• Fixed bug that reduced performance of Trends graphs
• General performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Fixed bug that caused the refresh indicator on Today view to stick around incorrectly when user swipes sleep days during a refresh
• Fixed bug associated with text being cutoff on the Discover feed on a minority of devices
• General performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• New gauge complication support for Series 4 Watches! See Total Sleep Time Goal Progress in a graphical gauge directly from your Watch Face on Series 4 models on the Infograph and Infograph Modular watch faces.
• General improvements


Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• General improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Fixed bug that caused 'No Sleep Data Available' to incorrectly show on WatchOS app in a limited number of cases
• General performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Now you can simply rotate the device orientation to toggle the display of your minute-by-minute sleep details from within the Today tab
• Fixed bug that caused the wOS app to show the 'loading spinner' indefinitely in very limited cases

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• For those with the new 44mm Apple Watch Series 4 device, the watchOS app interface elements now fit the entire width of device
• General performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• For those users with a new 44mm Apple Watch Series 4, the Avg. Sleeping Heart Rate bar (and SleepWatch Score bars for Premium users) within WatchOS Sleep Report notifications now span the full width of the device
• General performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing the new Sleep Pattern graph! Now you can see which periods of your sleep are Restful, Light, and Active directly from your wrist on the watchOS app or from within the Today tab on the iOS app.
• General performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• General performance improvements
• Bug fixes

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• General improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Fixed bug that caused a label on the WatchOS app for users with a 38mm Watch to be cut-off

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Now SleepWatch can help you keep track of how your sleep may be affecting your fatigueness level during the day by presenting you with a simple daily question. This new feature can be managed from the 'My Settings' section of the Account tab on the iOS app.
• You can now control your notification settings under the 'My Notifications' section of the Account tab on the iOS app.
• Fixed bug that caused the iOS app to crash when accessing Discover tab questions in rare cases

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• All users now have the ability to see additional details about their Total Sleep Time results with the addition of the Total Sleep Time detail view. Just simply tap on your Total Sleep Time Goal widget from the Today tab in the iOS app to see more.
• Wonder whether you sleep more or less than others? Premium users now have the ability to see how their Total Sleep Time results compare to others in the SleepWatch community. Tap the Total Sleep Time Goal widget from the Today tab in the iOS app to see more.
• Added additional controls for how to set your own notification settings under 'My Notifications' in the Account tab in the iOS app
• Fixed a couple rare bugs
• General improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Now you can keep track of both sleep deficit and sleep surplus over a 3-day period using the new 3-Day Sleep Target widget. Stay on target by meeting but not exceeding too far over your Total Sleep Time Goal.
• General performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Improved watchOS complication performance
• Various bug fixes

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing Smart Bedtime Reminders for Premium users. Based on your recent sleep times, SleepWatch can now automatically notify you when you might want to consider winding down for the night to help promote a good Sleep Rhythm.
• It’s now easier than ever to manually add your sleep times if you forgot to wear your Watch to sleep or if you don’t own a Watch. Upon waking each day, simply add your sleep times from within the iOS Today tab.
• Visibility of the Sleep Pattern graph on the iOS Today tab is now greatly improved.
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements

• See your answers to the daily 'Fatigueness' question from within the iOS Today tab to get a better sense of how your sleep may be impacting your level of fatigue each day. Now you can also answer your daily Fatigueness question from the iOS Today tab or from the watchOS app.
• General improvements and bug fixes

• Introducing Sleep Reports Cards! Generate an in-depth analysis of your sleep by starting a Sleep Report Card today. Each Sleep Report Card includes a multi-day assessment that can reveal a number of insights about your sleep. See the new 'Reports' tab in the iOS app for more info. Sleep Report Cards are available with an In App Purchase or Premium Membership.

• Save money on a SleepWatch Premium Membership by choosing the new Yearly subscription option. Start a new Yearly subscription or upgrade your existing Monthly subscription today.
• SleepWatch has a new look featuring a darker design that makes for more pleasant viewing during evening and bedtime hours.

• Fixed bug that caused a small subset of users to get results unexpectedly marked as 'Did Not Sleep' upon editing sleep times
• General performance enhancements and improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing Sleep Disruption tracking - a new way to help build a more complete picture of your sleep. Health research shows that the degree to which sleep is disrupted is an important indicator of sleep quality independent of total sleep time. See the new 'Sleep Disruptions' widget on the iOS or wOS app for more details.
• Save time when submitting certain responses to questions in the iOS app Updates tab using the new 'filter' functionality.
• General performance enhancements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

See the new 'Sleep Disruptions' widget on the iOS or wOS app for more details.
• Save time when submitting certain responses to questions in the iOS app Updates tab using the new 'filter' functionality.
• Bug fixes and general improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing 'Dark Mode'. If you often check the SleepWatch app on your phone before bedtime, consider using this new dark display mode. Dark Mode changes the background of the SleepWatch interface to all-black, making for easier viewing in the dark.
• Changes in your Sleep Disruptions can now be tracked from the iOS Trends tab.
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing 'Dark Mode'. If you often check the SleepWatch app on your phone before bedtime, consider using this new dark display mode. Dark Mode changes the background of the SleepWatch interface to all-black, making for easier viewing in the dark.
• Changes in your Sleep Disruptions can now be tracked from the iOS Trends tab.
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing the ability to track your Sleeping Heart Rate Variability (HRV), a new sleep metric that may reveal unique attributes about your sleep quality that heart rate can't. Sleeping HRV tracking is free for all users. Studies show that Sleeping HRV may reveal one's level of physiological aging. With Premium Membership, see if your Sleeping HRV is higher or lower than others your age.

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing Advanced Tracking mode for Premium Members. Advanced Tracking mode lets you estimate the time it takes you to fall asleep each night. Activate Advanced Tracking by tapping the 'Start Sleeping & Lights Out' button from within the watchOS app when you are ready to close your eyes and fall asleep. If you are not a Premium Member, you can upgrade today from the Account tab of the iOS app.

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing Advanced Tracking mode for Premium Members. Advanced Tracking mode lets you estimate the time it takes you to fall asleep each night. Activate Advanced Tracking by tapping the 'Start Sleeping & Lights Out' button from within the watchOS app when you are ready to close your eyes and fall asleep. If you are not a Premium Member, you can upgrade today from the Account tab of the iOS app.
• General performance enhancements

Enjoying SleepWatch? Please consider taking a brief moment to rate us on the App Store! Want to give us feedback? Send us a note at support@sleepwatchapp.com

• Introducing Advanced Tracking mode for Premium Members. Advanced Tracking lets you estimate your time to fall asleep and it actively monitors your sleep to wake you during a light phase in your configured alarm window. Activate Advanced Tracking by tapping the ‘Start Sleeping’ button from within the watchOS app when you are ready to close your eyes and fall asleep. If you are not a Premium Member, you can upgrade today from the Account tab of the iOS app.
• Avg. Sleeping Heart Rate trends graphs are now color coded based on your results
• New classification thresholds for Sleep Disruption insights for Premium Members
• General performance enhancements and bug fixes
